Name: Family Historian{{efn|group=gen_feat|Family Historian users can also optionally install free plugins (access to the Family Historian plugin store is integrated into the program). Scripting tools are included for automation of repetitive tasks  and much more.}}

Legacy Family Tree{{efn|group=gen_feat|Legacy Family Tree can also save DNA Test Results and Print the values. Mapping is included to automatically pinpoint and plot important locations in ancestors' lives.}}
